sen.j: 西園寺 嬉子（さいおんじ きし、藤原 嬉子（ふじわら の きし）、中宮 嬉子、建長4年（1252年） - 文保2年4月25日 (旧暦)（1318年5月26日））は、鎌倉時代の亀山天皇の中宮。
sen.e: Kishi SAIONJI (FUJIWARA no Kishi, Empress Kishi, 1252-May 26, 1318) was a chugu (the second consort of an emperor) of Emperor Kameyama in the Kamakura period.

Kishi SAIONJI (also known as FUJIWARA no Kishi and Empress Kishi, 1252 - June 3, 1318) was a chugu (the second consort of an emperor) of Emperor Kameyama during the Kamakura period.

sen.j: なお入内に際し、叔母にあたり、後嵯峨天皇の中宮で後深草天皇、亀山両天皇の生母である西園寺きつ子（大宮院）の猶子となっている。
sen.e: Before her bridal entry into court, she became the adopted child of Kitsushi SAIONJI (Omiyain) who was a chugu of Emperor Gosaga, and was the birth mother of Emperor Gofukakusa, Emperor Kameyama.

sen.e: Kishi never had a child with the emperor, and left the court six years after her bridal entry into court, when her father, Kinsuke passed away in 1267; she never came back to the court afterward.
